main.name: Lancy Goyal
main.description: React.js | React Native | Node.js | Spring Boot | Microservices | AWS | WooCommerce | Vue.js | MongoDB
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer with experience in understanding and analyzing the software engineering problems and implementing them. Technologies that I have used to develop apps are React.js, ReactNative, Redux, GraphQL, Node.js, Hapi.js, Socket.io, Express.js, Meteor.js, Vue.js, PWA, Spring Boot, MongoDB, AWS, Microservices, WooCommece, Wordpress, and Android. My interests range from Technology to Entrepreneurship. I am a technology driven person with an immense interest in Software Engineering Problems and Designs.

education.description: Completed B.Tech. in Information Technology with First Division.

work.title: Software Consultant
work.description: Fullstack Software Engineer having working experience on React.js, React Native, Redux, GraphQL, Node.js, Hapi.js, Socket.io, Express.js, Meteor.js and Vue.js, Microservices, Spring Boot, AWS, WooCommerce.

work.title: Assistant Manager
work.description: Fullstack Software Engineer Working on Domestic Money Transfer and Railway Ticket Booking Platform, B2B Portal, Offical Website.

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
work.description: Software Engineer having working experience on React.js, React Native, Redux, GraphQL, Node.js, Hapi.js, Socket.io, Express.js, Meteor.js and MongoDB.

projects.title: TopperQ
projects.category: TopperQ are a simple and easy to use platform for teachers and students.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.category: Simple Todo App using Vue and Firebase

testimonials.text: I've had pleasure of working with him. He has the rare combination of intellect and charisma that enables him to be one of the most effective leaders i have ever exposed to. My best wishes to him for continued success. (y)
Not a single day you will find when you haven't learn something new if you are working with him.

I highly recommend Lancy as he has excellent problem solving techniques. He is an excellent software architect. He knows very well how to manage his team as he is very good at management too. Overall he is an allrounder.
